inair.input

Class FocusManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • inair.input.FocusManager

  • public final class FocusManager
extends java.lang.Object

    FocusManager define attached property used for tracking the FocusedElement with a focus scope

    • Field Detail

      • GotFocusEvent

        public static final RoutedEvent GotFocusEvent
        GotFocus event

      • LostFocusEvent

        public static final RoutedEvent LostFocusEvent
        LostFocus event

      • FocusedElementProperty

        public static DependencyProperty FocusedElementProperty
        The DependencyProperty for the FocusedElement property. Default value: null

      • IsFocusScopeProperty

        public static final DependencyProperty IsFocusScopeProperty
        The DependencyProperty for the IsFocusScope property. This property is used to mark the special containers so they can keep track of the FocusedElement element inside the container. Once focus is set on the container - it is delegated to the FocusedElement element Default Value: false
